Class UserProjectileManagerTest

java.lang.Object
Managers.UserProjectileManagerTest
public class UserProjectileManagerTest extends Object
Unit tests for the UserProjectileManager class. This class contains tests that validate the functionality of the UserProjectileManager, which manages the lifecycle and collection of projectiles fired by the user. Source Code: GitHub Link

  • Constructor Details

    • UserProjectileManagerTest

      public UserProjectileManagerTest()

  • Method Details

    • setupJavaFX

      public static void setupJavaFX()
      Initializes the JavaFX platform if it hasn't been started already. This method ensures that the JavaFX environment is ready for testing.

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment. Initializes the root Group and the UserProjectileManager instance, then fires an initial projectile.

    • testGetUserProjectiles

      public void testGetUserProjectiles()
      Tests retrieving the list of user projectiles. Fires another projectile and checks that the list of projectiles is not empty and contains the new projectile.

    • testSingletonPattern

      public void testSingletonPattern()
      Tests the singleton pattern implementation in UserProjectileManager. Verifies that a new instance of UserProjectileManager with a different root does not create a new instance, but returns the same instance as the original.

    • testFireProjectile

      public void testFireProjectile()
      Tests the fireProjectile method. Fires a new projectile and verifies that the projectile count increases and the new projectile is different from the initial one.
